vsParam:
! You defeated my men...
Kind of impressive.

Tell me about it.
Why do you want me to disembark?
Because I've fallen in love with you!

Someone wants to see me?
Well...

Um... I-it's... tricky.
We'd better take it slow...

Don't talk nonsense, [px]!
Verbena, someone wants to see you.

Someone wants to see me?
What? Not love... Ahem, um...

Sorry, but no.
I will not disembark.

So I will not disembark until I see it again.

I see...
Verbena, let's make a deal.

if we bring the "Crown of the Blue Sea" here?

... Deal. As long as you can get the crown.
I'll keep sailing this ship before that.

Steady!!

The ship is gone... Hmm...

I don't know... But we have to give it a try
to get the "Alchemy of Water" skill book...
